summary: Seasoned retail operations and HR professional with experience in payroll management, staffing, training, inventory control, and loss prevention. Proven leader with strong communication, analytical, and problem-solving skills; adept at improving efficiency and driving results.

experience.title: Assistant Store Manager of Operations and Human Resources
experience.description: Oversees payroll projections, productivity, and controllable expenses; reviews schedules and directs area supervisors to optimize staffing; leads truck unload to meet company standards; manages stockroom capacity, remodeling and maintenance projects; ensures safety compliance and building upkeep; partners with Loss Prevention on inventory programs; leads HR functions including interviews, staffing, annual reviews, coaching, and training; develops and coaches Area Supervisors; participates in executive recruitment at NC State University.

experience.title: Assistant Store Manager of Apparel and Accessories
experience.description: Analyzed business reports to identify growth opportunities; partnered with HR/Ops ASM to address inventory issues; ensured adherence to merchandise presentation standards; developed action plans to outperform LY figures; operated Kronos payroll system; led associate development, sales area supervision, and expense management; completed counseling documentation and annual reviews; recruited, interviewed, and hired new talent.

experience.title: Manager in Training (MIT)
experience.description: Led Manager on Duty program; resolved escalated customer concerns; drove loyalty programs; coached cashiers on customer engagement; maintained daily sales floor standards; motivated associates through recognition; managed merchandising updates and sales growth of Home Decor and Juniors; performed duties during MIT program.

experience.title: Store Management Intern
experience.description: Assisted store management with day-to-day operations; led teams in sales floor moves; partnered with dock supervisor to expedite truck freight; completed Capstone Project on store environment and opportunities.

experience.title: Vice-President of Community Service
experience.description: Organized campus-wide community service activities; educated students on budgeting, credit, and debt management; trained peer counselors; coordinated with alumni and business community to support career development; organized blood drives; partnered with faculty for fundraising events.
